text: i am emily ! i am 12 and i am a good dancer ! what are you good at ?
wow ! mee , to . i am beaming ! i cud danse the hole nite long !
how are you ? i like to surf . do you like a band ?
hi i just lost my cat so i am not good
thanks for your service ! i am a little tired today was at a rise against concert last night .
oh cool ! i really like going to concerts . i would like to get tickets to the the voice .
that would be fun . i am usually a night owl so should not complain . where was tour ?
yes . so do you have any hobbies ?
i love sports ! i ; m excited for the nfl season . what about you ?
wow ! how old are you ? i am seven ! i am short for now .
seven ? ! you must be in first grade then ?
my teacher says i am not smart . i cannot be in the gifted classes . i like gifts .
aww ! i like gifts too ! i got a stuffed dog after my surgery .
surgery for what ? did they cut you open ?
that is awesome i would love to be a cook . i am great at cooking .
i became a huge fan after listening to classical jazz
yea my daughter loves classical jazz . not so much me though .
yeah what does she like about it ? i am 18 and overcame urinary cancer
sorry to hear that . what do you do for a living ? i sell paper products .
will you cook me some burgers with cheese ?
i do not cook , sorry .
i am good , how are you ?
hi there what video games do you play ?
i do not play video games , but i cook for my family
after marriage for me , had 2 kids and needed to change professions
what professions ? i work at a bank full time .
i go shopping a lot , and do blog reviews for the things i purchase
awesome ! ! you can make money with that . i live in my grandmother , in her guesthouse .
i was a cheerleader in high school but i could not make money doing that
i was adopted so i never got to meet my parents
that is sad . i moved to vermont so i do not see my parents often
hi there . how are you tonight ?
i am very sad tonight i am sorry
oh , i am sorry . both my parents are dead .
mine are so mean . they do not care
what do you do for a living ?
i raise my 3 kids and sing
i love listening to music .
hi ! i am aiden ! who are you ?
i am mike , nice to meet you .
hi mike ! do you like soccer ? i love soccer !
it is decent . i like basketball a lot !
hi how are you
hello ! i am well . working on my halloween costume .
i want to be mater for halloween and you ?
i like dressing up as anything because it is my favorite holiday .
i hope they give out ice cream as a treat
i have a daughter with long brown hair like me
she sounds like a pretty woman , and i love that movie !
i like that movie too . julia roberts was great
yeah , she is a dream . i should call her on one of my phones .
you have more than one phone ?
